content_html:
Kathmandu, September 15

Newly appointed Minister for Energy, Physical Infrastructure and Urban Development, Kulman Ghising, went straight to Tribhuvan University Teaching Hospital in Maharajgunj after taking the oath of office at Sheetal Niwas.

Ghising visited the families of those killed and injured during the Gen-Z protests. He said he would only assume office at the ministry after meeting the injured.

The post Kulman Ghising visits teaching hospital immediately after swearing-in appeared first on OnlineKhabar English News.
